page.title: 10WILTSHIRE DOWNS TEST CROPS
page.content: Part of this area is given over to test seeding of new types of crop. Each field is carefully prepared and monitored from the planting of the seed to the harvesting of the crop. A board is also displayed bearing its name and type. The following crops were planted this year: 170 acres - Oil Seed Rape (JET NEUF) 200 acres - Sugar Beet (PRIMO) 1,200 acres - Winter Wheat (ARMADA) 600 acres - Winter Barley (KLAXON) 200 acres - Spring Barley (IGRI) 80 acres - 1st year Grasscrop (RVP) 130 acres - 2nd year Grasscrop (RVP) 60 acres - 1st year MEL (Grasses) 50 acres - 2nd year MEL (Grasses). Results have been quite favourable.
